data.title: Data Centres - Colocation Solutions - Hybrid Cloud
data.meta_description: Future-proof your business with NEXTDC. Data centre solutions that enable critical colocation, connectivity and cloud readiness Australia-wide.
data.text:
Cloud

Cloud computing has revolutionised the way data centres operate.

With the fastest private and secure access to global cloud providers, NEXTDC offers extensive network connectivity to ensure greater flexibility, scalability and cost efficiency for your cloud solutions. Whether you are seeking infrastructure, software or platform services our low-latency interconnectivity solutions will boost cloud performance.

Cybersecurity

Protecting data centre infrastructure and its sensitive information is crucial.

Our cybersecurity channel partners have a deep understanding of the latest vulnerabilities, threats and can provide customised security solutions to fit the unique needs of your organisation and keep your business safe.

Managed Services

Managing data centre infrastructure can be a complex task, with our managed services channel partners, you can streamline the management of your IT services and focus on what matters most, your business.

Our managed services providers are experts in their field and can provide proactive monitoring, maintenance and support to ensure that your IT infrastructure is running smoothly, efficiently and effectively.

System Integrators

Our system integrator channel partners are experts in designing, implementing and maintaining complex IT systems for data centres.

They specialise in integrating various technology components, such as hardware, software and networks, to create a seamless and efficient IT infrastructure. They can provide customised solutions to meet the unique needs of your data centre and can help optimise its performance and scalability. They also have the knowledge and expertise to ensure that your data centre is compliant with industry standards and certification requirements.

Telecommunications

Telecommunications is an important aspect of data centre operations.

Our Telco, Carrier and Network channel partners understand the network infrastructure requirements of data centres and can help provide you with intelligent network solutions that connect, communicate and collaborate better across user devices, applications and workloads.

Consulting Services

We understand that leveraging the expertise of consulting service providers can help accelerate your digital strategy. Our channel partners are experts in their field and can provide custom solutions tailored to your unique needs, driving growth and efficiency for your organisation.

“We never have to worry about resilience, reliability, or security concerns. We know those risks are taken off the table for us by NEXTDC.”

John Reisinger

CTO

"With infrastructure in NEXTDC’s facilities, we can then use the AXON network to quickly and easily, connect and deploy to any cloud platform we want."

Mark Naidoo

Head of IT Architecture

“With infrastructure in NEXTDC’s facilities, we can then use the AXON network to connect and deploy to any cloud platform we want.”

John Cloud

Head of IT Architecture
